definition: a pointed instrument that is used to prod into a state of motion, poke or thrust abruptly
details:
noun
- a pointed instrument that is used to prod into a state of motion
= synonyms: goad
- a verbalization that encourages one to attempt something
= example: a verbalization that encourages one to attempt something
= synonyms: urging
verb
- poke or thrust abruptly
= synonyms: dig
- urge on
= synonyms: incite, egg on
- to push against gently
= synonyms: nudge
